## Search by NUTS


```{r nuts, echo=FALSE}

library(giscoR)
library(sf)
library(dplyr)
library(reactable)


nuts_codes <- gisco_get_nuts(
  year = 2021,
  epsg = 4326,
  cache_dir = "../assets/data/geojson",
  resolution = 20
) %>% st_drop_geometry()

df <- nuts_codes %>% select(CNTR_CODE,NUTS_NAME, NAME_LATN, NUTS_ID)

reactable(df,
          filterable = TRUE,
          searchable = TRUE,
          showPageSizeOptions = TRUE,
          striped = TRUE,
          paginationType = "jump"
          )

```
